name: Crumpy Jump
description:
Crumpy Jump is endless-jumper game I've just released. It's currently available for Android devices.

It has:
✓ Robots
✓ Adventurers
✓ Zombies
✓ Carnivorous plans
✓ Dragons
✓ Cute animals
✓ Mummies

You'll probably die a lot. Evil wizards, wildlife and traps will take care of it.

But it won't stop you from having a lot of fun.

- Intuitive one touch controls. Perfect on the go.
- Colorful and stunning 3d pixel art
- Collect pop art inspired characters
- Dodge evil wizards, wildlife, and traps on your way
- Simple, pure and fun gameplay
- Free to play
